entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CSharpScript.EvaluateAsync: Returns `null` when C# code ends with trailing semicolon #77512
  • GetDeclaredSymbol does not return an appropriate IParameterSymbol on a modern extension ParameterSyntax. #77502
  • The VS Stack Trace Explorer cannot resolve .razor files #77499
  • When the warning is long I can't see the end of it in the bottom bar of Visual Studio #77497
  • Run Code Analysis continues to be broken #77495
  • I have to fight against the "dot to insert empty arglist" autocompletion feature to use nested class inheritance-based C# unions #77480

Closed

  • Revert WPF work around when we merge RC1 SDK #74923
    17.13
  • JsonSerializerOptions is not accepted for JsonSerializer.Deserialize #77474

PullRequests

Created

  • Results of running 'use null propagation' #77513
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • On-the-fly-docs Pass along additional context #77510
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Clean up implementation of SourceMethodSymbol.AddSynthesizedAttributes after merge from 'main' #77509
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'main-vs-deps' #77508
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add more modern-extension FAR tests #77503
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix run code analysis on solution not reporting results #77501
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Show analysis status in task status center instead of status bar #77496
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • [Personal Review Only] Prototype/field nullability 3 #77491
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove CurrentManagedThreadId deoptimization from yield codegen #77478
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Dictionary expressions: support concrete target types that do not use `[CollectionBuilder]` #77477
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions

Merged

  • Remove workaround of WPF bug #77462
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Update nav-bar to support modern extensions #77504
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'release/dev18.0' #77507
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Do not offer 'extract interface' on an extension type #77506
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Do not offer 'convert to regular constructor' on an extension type #77505
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Merge 'main' into extensions #77487
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Update navigate-to to support modern extensions #77498
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add quick info tests for extensions #77492
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'main-vs-deps' #77493
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'release/dev18.0' #77494
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs UX Triage
  • Add 'find-refs' tests for extensions #77490
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add 'go to def' tests for extensions #77489
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix formatting of new extensions #77488
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'main-vs-deps' #77486
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'release/dev18.0' #77485
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Rename flyout] Fixed cropping issue on small screens #77466
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • Remove unnecessary imports #77481
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Update 'use conditional expr' to support null-conditional-assignment #77484
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update generate-variable to understand null-conditional-assignment #77482
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update 'use null prop' to support null-conditional-assignment #77483
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Use original names for extension implementation methods #77455
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Use GetIsNewExtensionMember helper in more places #77461
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Update dev18 target branch #77443
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Fix Stack Trace Explorer for additional documents #77517
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Make ISemanticSearchCopilotUIProvider import lazy to avoid loading VS.EA.Copilot #77516
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Disable downloading the runtime packages during restore and instead ensure that it happens when needed (pack) #77515
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement field null resilience analysis #77127
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Adds :bulb: `Implement Using Copilot` for `NotImplementedException` #77299
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Extensions: resolve new members like classic extension methods #77423
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • [WIP] Merge RoslynAnalyzers into Roslyn #77178
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • WIP: Remove source generator diagnostic reporting from Workspace #76863
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Support IsActiveDocument in RoslynCodeSearchResult #77311
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Make partial interface members virtual #77379
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add stubs for semantic model apis needed by IDE #77448
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
